entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishContainer + GeneratePackageOnBuild results in race #47429
  • [dotnet-watch] Watch restarts app without waiting for a file change when process terminates #47425
  • CLI: Add deprecation mechanism for aliases #47419
  • Net9 - dotnet watch opens the applicationUrl on every restart now #47410

Closed

  • `ExcludeAssets="compile"` has no effect on `ProjectReference`. #47403
  • 9.0.200 breaks "dotnet workload restore ..\some.sln" #47390
  • [APICompat] AssemblyLoadErrors should not be saved as CompatDifference #34064
    Backlog
  • Update vs-solutionpersistence to 1.0.52 #47297

PullRequests

Created

  • Reworked asset comparison #47428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make container app/entrypoint argument defaults only happen on the RID-specific builds, not the outer RID-less build #47424
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [REF] SolutionProjectModel Full Paths #47422
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit specifying to use workload versions in global.json #47421
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update SDK-PR-guide.md to include inter-branch codeflow #47420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create logger directory if it doesn't exist in dotnet test #47411
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged

Merged

  • Clean up extensions for dotnet CLI & Utils #47373
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reapply "Fixup sourcelink information" (#47416) #47417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WorkloadRestoreCommand.DiscoverAllProjects: Return full paths #47415
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.3xx] Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #47021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Fixup sourcelink information" #47416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixup sourcelink information #47363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update logic of mixed mode of dotnet test #47407
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet test improvements for MTP #47395
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete GetTestsProject task #47394
    untriaged

Updated

  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix MAUI static asset updates #47431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 9.0.4
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate the sdk msi bundles inside the VMR on windows BuildPass=2 verticals #47397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
